Plot: A single mother, plagued by the violent death of her husband, battles with her son's fear of a monster lurking in the house, but soon discovers a sinister presence all around her.
Title: The Babadook
Actors: Essie Davis, Noah Wiseman, Hayley McElhinney, Daniel Henshall
tomatoConsensus: The Babadook relies on real horror rather than cheap jump scares -- and boasts a heartfelt, genuinely moving story to boot.
